com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking.status

Interface CheckingStatus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckingStatusImpl

    public interface CheckingStatus
    The interface CheckingStatus is used for inserting the checking status into checked documents. The default use should be iterating over asStringMap() and writing values to the document's meta data. There is also a type-safe version using getValue(CheckingStatusKey).getName() and getValue(CheckingStatusKey).getValue() using CheckingStatusKey

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<CheckingStatusKey<?>,CheckingStatusValue<?>> asMap()
      As a type-safe map of CheckingStatusKeys and CheckingStatusValues.
      Map<String,String> asStringMap() 
      Set<CheckingStatusKey<?>> getKeys()
      Gets all supported CheckingStatusKey.Keys.
      <T> CheckingStatusValue<T> getValue(CheckingStatusKey<T> key)
      Gets the value.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        <T> CheckingStatusValue<T> getValue(CheckingStatusKey<T> key)
        Gets the value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type depending on CheckingStatusKey.Keys type
        Parameters:
        key - the key, for example CheckingStatusKey.Keys.DATE
        Returns:
        the value. It provides methods CheckingStatusValue.getName() and CheckingStatusValue.getValue()

      • getKeys

        Set<CheckingStatusKey<?>> getKeys()
        Gets all supported CheckingStatusKey.Keys.

      • asStringMap

        Map<String,String> asStringMap()
        Returns:
        the map filled by Keys and Values as string. See CheckingStatusValue.toString().

      • asMap

        Map<CheckingStatusKey<?>,CheckingStatusValue<?>> asMap()
        As a type-safe map of CheckingStatusKeys and CheckingStatusValues.
